body.name: 𝑯𝑶𝑴𝑬 𝑶𝑭𝑭𝑰𝑪𝑬 𝑪𝑯𝑨𝑰𝑹, Ergonomic Mesh Desk Chair, High Back Computer Chair- Adjustable Headrest with Flip-Up Arms, Lumbar Support, Swivel Executive Task Chair (Modern, Black)
features: ✍【5-year warranty】 - 5 years warranty included: 90-day Returns and Exchanges for free 5-year Maintenance (Free part repair & replacement & refund with no excuse) Please contact us directly via Amazon messages or our after-sale service email first if you need a warranty claim. We will get back to you in 24 hours.
✍【High-quality materials】 - Our office chair is made with high-quality materials, such as premium leather and durable metal, ensuring longevity and durability.

✍【Adjustable features】 - CYKOV ergonomic office computer chair has adjustable features such as 4'' height, 90°-135° tilt, and reclining, and 6‘’ headrest adjustment, 90° flip-up armrest allowing you to customize the home office desk chair to your preferences and needs.
✍【Multi-functional】- This task chair is multi-functional, with features such as 360° swiveling, rolling, and rocking, allowing you to perform a range of tasks comfortably and efficiently.
✍【Stylish appearance】 - The task chair has a sleek and modern appearance with a 300lb weight capacity, making it a great addition to any office or home workspace.

✍【Easy to assemble】 - 20 min to assemble this comfortable chair which comes with all the necessary tools and instructions. BIFMA Certified & Class 4 Gas Cylinder ergonomic chair offers more comfort and safety.

✍【Comfortable home office desk chair】- CYKOV office chair is designed to provide maximum comfort and support, with ergonomic features such as lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and a contoured seat cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, Comfortable Chair with Excellent Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Overall:- Adjustments include: armrests, tension, reclining angle, lumbar support, height, and different angles/heights for the headrest.- Assembled alone in under an hour, back-up hardware included as a thoughtful touch.- Two right-armrests does not make a chair, but great customer service helps make that right.Rating: 4.75/5 for some small stipulations of quality.Appearance: It’s simple and attractive without too many bells and whistles, perhaps the protruding bar of the headrest feels a bit odd though that may just be my preference.Assembly: This is something that most people would be able to put together themselves within an hour or so; the necessary hardware is all laid out into a small package (a photo of which some others have included) clearly labeled with letters and designations that line up with the instructional booklet. Said instructional booklet also has photos of the corresponding parts you’ll need for each step, and kindly caps-locked warnings about sections where things might get a little wonky. It’s clear and easy to read, even with small grammatical errors here and there. (And this is coming from someone not very technically inclined.)Customer Service: I can speak to firsthand experience with the customer service team. I received two right armrests in my original package, I reached out to the included email about getting me a left-armrest and they got back to me within around 24-hours. If I remember this was near the Easter weekend as well, and yet the response was still timely. They got my shipping information, reconfirmed that I did have two right armrests through photo, and then sent out a tracking number for my missing part. Aside from that, there’s still a five year warranty in play that comes with the chair, and I’m willing to believe they’ll honor it based on my interaction with them thusfar.Comfort and Ergonomics: Like I mentioned in my brief bullet-points, there’s a number of different adjustments that can be made to the chair itself. They’re thoughtful and considerate. Perhaps not as expansive as everyone would need, though more than enough for my purposes. The cushion on both the armrests and the chair bottom itself is plush and comfortable. I think the material of the cushions, being leather, is a bit less breathable than the mesh back-rest, but the plushness makes up for that and it’s nothing that a blanket can’t fix. I didn’t think I’d like the headrest, being of a shorter height (a few inches over five feet) I expected that it’d be too high for me to even use. Surprisingly, it does adjust low enough that I can comfortably use it in a wide range of positions, and the transfer from angles happens naturally. I used the chair for hours on end, and I couldn’t complain about it at the end of the day, as opposed to others, so it passes my checks for comfort.Value: At the full price point, there are a few small quips that I think leave it as a four out of five for me. In one of my photos, you can see a protruding metal part, that is meant to be where one of the screws for the headrest should go, and it should be built flush into the plastic, not at a place where it might jab into my back or neck with a bit too much leaning, and a thin mesh film separate. I used a slightly longer screw (one of the spares for a different part) and it held the headrest tight, or else it would have wobbled with the intended screw. Where the headrest sits for me, I don’t anticipate it being an issue since there’s two layers of protection, though it’s not the best vouch of quality control. I tested the wheels on both wood floor and the carpet of my office. Maybe it’s because they’re new, but it moves a bit like that odd-cart in a grocery store that has a tendency to drift. Aside from that, the lumbar support feels a bit flimsy, given that it is only a piece of plastic, but it has made me more conscious of my own posture. In general, all the adjustments that you can make all have this feeling of being a bit, loosey-goosey. The armchairs flip up, and they stay, though there’s something about the motion that doesn’t quite have a full clickiness that gives me the sense they’re secure and will stay that way for long. Likewise changing your reclining angle and tilt feels a bit odd even though the lock itself seems secure. The metal and leather portions of the chair feel well-made though, and I appreciate that.Again, I think that the few quirks of my experience mean I might have considered this chair, an overall, 4.75 rather than outright 5, though there’s a lot of things that the chair and the company behind it are doing well, so I’m rounding up. I think that it’s numerous adjustments and features would make it suitable for many people and I will continue to happily use it throughout its lifespan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CYKOV Office Chair is well built, great features, great buy
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this CYKOV Office chair to replace my old one. Its features fit my needs. Received it in a well packed box. Assembly manual was very easy to follow. All the screws, washers, etc. were clearly identified. They even included extra pieces. A pleasant surprise. Other companies don't. I really loved the "T" shaped Allen Wrench. So easy to use. Easy on the hand and wrist. Made assembly easier. Assembled chair is very sturdy. Easy to roll and swivel. Cushioned seat and armrests are great. I have back issues, so the high back, lumbar support, and adjustable headrest were just what I needed. I can sit at my desk in comfort. This chair is of high quality and a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Blend of Comfort and Support
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 𝑯𝑶𝑴𝑬 𝑶𝑭𝑭𝑰𝑪𝑬 𝑪𝑯𝑨𝑰𝑹, Ergonomic Mesh Desk Chair, High Back Computer Chair and it has been a game-changer for my home office setup.The ergonomic design of this chair is truly remarkable. It provides excellent support to my back, ensuring that I maintain a good posture throughout my workday. The high back design is a standout feature, providing ample support to my neck and shoulders, reducing strain during long hours of work.The mesh material is breathable and comfortable, keeping me cool even after hours of sitting. The chair is also adjustable, allowing me to find the perfect height and tilt for my desk.The assembly was straightforward with clear instructions, and the build quality is top-notch. It’s sturdy, yet has a sleek design that adds a professional touch to my home office.In conclusion, this chair has significantly improved my comfort and productivity while working from home. I highly recommend the 𝑯𝑶𝑴𝑬 𝑶𝑭𝑭𝑰𝑪𝑬 𝑪𝑯𝑨𝑰𝑹, Ergonomic Mesh Desk Chair, High Back Computer Chair to anyone in need of a high-quality, comfortable, and supportive office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were great, the parts were easy to put together and seem of good quality and sturdiness. However, the packaging for the screws and Allen wrench was not the best, I would have preferred they be put in individual packaging but I just had to take a picture of the labeled packaging before I opened it and it was easy to keep track of all pieces. I chose this chair over others because of it's price, the discount I got, the overall style of the chair and the weight limit. I am about 300lbs so I needed something with that weight limit. The chair has a pretty big seat and the arm rest don't constrict my torso or thighs. I am even able to sit with one leg under me. The seat cushion could be better, it's a bit hard and not soft or bouncy, more of a sturdy leather. It took me about 20-30 minutes to put it all together, all the screws and the Allen wrench were included. I was worried about the piston part, the mechanism that allows the chair to go up and down but surprisingly that was the easiest part of the assembly. The headrest is a little weird, it feels comfortable when I'm able to rest my head on it but I can only do so if I'm leaning back and have my head back but it's really adjustable so that's good. So far so good.Pardon my messy room.I'm currently tly activating my 5 year warranty that was included in the purchase, I almost purchased the 40 2 year warranty that Amazon offered me but I saw that this 5 year warranty was included in my purchase.

This chair is exactly what I needed! I have a white desk set up and it looks really great with everything else.I love the space this chair has and the fact the arm rests flip up allowing it to slide under my desk easily as my desk is in my small bedroom.The adjustable back support and headrest are really nice to have considering how much time I spend at a desk.I thought this chair would be difficult to assemble on my own but the instructions were very clear and everything was super easy. Took me less than 40 minutes including opening everything. I also like the extra hardware provided and gloves to keep everything clean!Very happy with my chair!

Esta silla ha sido una grata sorpresa: el asiento es super cómodo para las horas que paso sentada por home office, el diseño me encantó es bonita y muy diferente a la clásica silla de oficina. Súper bien que tiene soporte de cabeza y lumbar ajustables. Es un plus que los descansa brazos se puedan mover. El armado fue sencillo. Muy acorde la relación calidad-precio. La recomiendo!

Design feels substandard. A lot of cheap feeling plastic components. One of the screw hole does not even align with the socket inside, which prevent the screw from even getting screwed in. Requested for a return/refund. Will steer clear from this brand in the future.

This chair is very comfortable, seat and back and even headrest support me well, and allow me to sit comfortably for hours. Built really well and instructions were excellent. They provide extra of most screws in case they get lost. Shipping was quick. Seat does not go as low as my previous chair and with non adjustable arms you may not be able to use them while on keyboard if your desk is lower

Fácil de armar, cómoda, silenciosa al moverla. La compré para Home Office, por lo que la usaré al menos 8 horas al día. Tengo solo dos días con ella pero hasta ahora me gusta bastante. Actualizaré esta opinión en 6 meses cuando tenga más tiempo usándola.
